item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Posting: Social Media Video Editor**

We are seeking a skilled and knowledgeable video editor with expertise in creating social media reels and content. The ideal candidate should be proficient in the Adobe Suite and possess strong skills in visual effects, sound effects, color correction and adjustments, transitions, and video editing to ensure high-quality output.

Key Responsibilities:
- Edit raw content into engaging social media reels and videos
- Follow provided sample videos closely to maintain consistency
- Apply visual and sound effects to enhance video quality
- Perform color correction and adjustments
- Utilize transitions effectively
- Ensure all content aligns with our brand’s high standards

Qualifications:
- Proficiency in Adobe Suite
- Strong knowledge of visual effects, sound effects, and transitions
- Experience in color correction and video adjustments
- Excellent communication skills
- Passion for learning and improving skills

Our brand focuses on sportswear, so a passion for fitness and product content is a plus. If you are a dedicated and creative video editor looking to make an impact, we would love to hear from you!





Posted On: June 30, 2024 18:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Editor for Instagram Reel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a captivating highlights Instagram reel from an already edited highlights 6-minute landscape video. The reel should showcase the best moments and most engaging content to attract viewers. As the editor, you will need to have a strong understanding of storytelling and pacing, as well as the ability to add creative transitions and effects. Attention to detail and a keen eye for visual aesthetics are crucial. The final reel should be dynamic, visually appealing, and effectively convey the key message.
Roughly One Wedding Video a month
Video Example to be edited....
https://vimeo.com/960492151
  Skills required:
  - Video editing
  - Storytelling
  - Pacing
  - Transitions
  - Visual effects
  - Attention to detail
  - Creative thinking

Budget: $70

item.title: YouTube Shorts Creator/Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! I run a pretty established YouTube channel in the Dash Cam niche. I am looking for the following things:

1. Collection of content, finding the videos (keep in mind they are shorts, so they are straightforward to find)
2. Simple edits to keep viewers engaged
3. Voice-over OR small text explanation to keep the viewers engaged.

(I would like to see some examples of previous work just to see your style of edits and engagement retention)

If Interested I will talk duration and amount of videos. If you have any questions please ask

Budget: $50

item.title: Instagram Reel Creation for Custom Steering Wheel Covers/upholstery - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a talented freelancer to create an engaging and dynamic Instagram reel to showcase and promote my custom steering wheel covers. You can check out our IG for more details: @inter_customs.

Product Highlights:
• Custom-made to fit any steering wheel.
• Premium materials: original Italian Alcantara and genuine leather.
• Clients can choose the material, stitching color, and marker.
• Easy installation for clients.

Requirements:
• Create a scroll-stopping, viral-worthy Instagram reel.
• Include dynamic captions and sound effects.
• Incorporate nasheeds (vocal music) for a unique touch.
• Provide an AI voice-over in Dutch.
• Ensure the reel is engaging and visually appealing without using any music.

I will provide some videos for you to work with. The final product should effectively highlight the uniqueness and quality of our custom steering wheel covers.

Skills Needed:
• Video editing and creation
• Experience with Instagram reels
• Adding dynamic captions and sound effects
• Creativity and attention to detail

If this sounds like a project you can excel at, please apply with examples of your previous work and a brief overview of how you plan to approach this project.



Posted On: June 30, 2024 18:47 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Video Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Video Editing
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: Edit an existing promo video - Upwork
item.description:
WHAT

We already have a promo reel for a documentary that never came to be.  Wed liek to edit what we already have my simply "splicing" in:

New intro / opening title
Stock, archival, and current sporting footage (current video is too focused on MMA)
New music (Finding some beats and timing is up to the designer, but a big plus)
New end card with new logo and credits

Final delivery should be both desktop and mobile / social friendly, even if imagery gets cropped.

We want one solid desktop video we can keep, a promo reel, and some shorter IG stories we can cull from the final.

CAPPED BUDGET — WHY / HOW DARE WE?

Because the meat of the video already exists, and we are just changing the intro, outro, and adding some stock video, our logo assets, and music  all of which we will provide, we estimate this is about a days work on the outside for an experienced editor, and our budget reflects that.

We haven't made shit on apparel yet, so this gig is for someone who cares about this kind of content, wants to help something grow, and wants to plant seeds for future work and collabation.

WHY?

We are promoting a new, small apparel line that may have multiple sub-brands, this is a good opportunity to get involved with us and take on more video and editing as we launch those lines and expand.  We have been designing apparel for some of the biggest (or at least most promising) names in a particular niche space, and seen every shade of success, and every obvious failure.  We are done building companies for idiots.  Its our turn...and maybe yours.

EXTRAS

We will probably want a very simple, stand alone logo animation in the course of updating this video.  By simple we mean a fly-in, a "spell-out", or possibly a "sketch-in" style animated logo.  

FUN / THE LONG TERM

There is plenty of room fro creative license with all the aspects of this project, so long as the work adheres to the brand fundamentals, which have to do with vintage athletics, combat sports, and a male-centric audience.  Think NO MAS, Roots of Fight, Violent Gentlemen, etc  — but with better, more meaningful work, and a stronger brand foundation.

*As we grow, product photography will become a HUGE plus.m. So if you have shot apparel with or without models, show us.


STARTING / SELECTION

Once you respond we will review your video and animation portfolio, and link you to our original Doc Reel for your review.

We will follow the rules of Upwork, with the addition of a simple NDA.


ABOUT US

Combined 30 years of brand ID, strategy, and visual design experience at the highest levels.   We are collaborative, open to new ideas, but we are mega design snobs.  If your work is weak, we're gonna tell you.  That's how this industry works...or used to...and will again.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 18:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Short Video Ad, Logo Animation, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Product Photography, Startup Company
Skills: Video Editing, Short Video Ad, Logo Animation, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Product Photography, Startup Company
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 1. Canva Design Expert for Promotional Videos and Social Media Content - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Creative Canva Design Expert for Engaging Promotional Materials

Job Description:
KUY AI is seeking a highly skilled and creative Canva expert to produce engaging promotional videos and social media stories. This role requires high-level experience in creating compelling visual content that aligns with our dynamic project goals.

Responsibilities:

Design and produce high-quality promotional videos and graphics within Canva.
Create engaging stories for various social media platforms, maintaining brand consistency.
Collaborate closely with the marketing team to translate marketing objectives into impactful visual content.
Required Qualifications:

Extensive experience in professional Canva design.
Demonstrable expertise in creating social media content and promotional videos.
Ability to deliver projects on a tight schedule and manage multiple tasks efficiently.
Offer:

Fixed-term employment with a possibility of entering the company as a shareholder based on performance.
To Apply:
Submit your portfolio showcasing your best Canva work along with your resume.




Posted On: June 30, 2024 18:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Concept Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Instagram, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Social Media Management, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Concept Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Instagram, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Social Media Management, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing
Country: Dominican Republic

item.title: Looking for VIDEO EDITOR | Tiktok/FB Style Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor for multiple tiktok/FB style videos for our brand.

In most cases, we can provide the content needed to create these videos.

we are looking to build a long-term relationship with a video editor, so if all goes well in the initial round there would be plenty of work in the future.

Requirements:

- Must have experience with TT/FB style videos.
*** Do not apply if you do not have experience

-  Have experience adding animations to videos

- Understand what makes a video perform well and explain why

- Expert in Capcut, Premier Pro, Canva

- Must be willing to work together to make a video perfect... Suppose we find something that needs to be revised in a video, whether it's an animation, a single clip in the video or half of the video. In that case, we cannot hear that 'this revision was not included in original plan.' This is a collaborative process for creating great videos.

Please read the above carefully and provide me your portfolio and anything else you feel would make you a great candidate for this job.




Posted On: June 30, 2024 18:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, Video Editing, TikTok Ad, Facebook Ad Campaign, Facebook Advertising
Skills: TikTok Video, Video Editing, TikTok Ad, Facebook Ad Campaign, Facebook Advertising
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Underwater Diving Image and Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a talented individual to edit and color correct underwater diving images and videos. As an editor, you will be responsible for enhancing the overall quality and appeal of the footage, ensuring that the colors are vibrant and true to life. The ideal candidate must have experience with underwater imaging and be familiar with the unique challenges posed by this environment. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure that the final output meets our high standards.

Relevant skills:
- Proficiency in photo and video editing software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro)
- Strong understanding of color correction techniques
- Knowledge of underwater photography/videography

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Expertise level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $12.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 18:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Education
Country: United States
click to apply
